item.title: AMC Theatres Offers Horror Fans Cost-Saving “Slash Pass” Timed to ‘The Conjuring: The Last Rites’
item.description: For $66.66, moviegoers can see six films participating in the limited-time program between now and the end of the year, including over Halloween.

item.title: AMC Theatres Cutting Some Pre-Show “Marketing Material” Even As It Keeps Ad Deal In Place
item.description: It appears to be a sign that the theater chain recognizes consumers aren’t fond of all the advertisements.

item.title: AMC Theatres’ Shares Jump As Box Office Surges In Latest Quarter
item.description: Overall revenues jumped 35 percent to $1.4 billion as the mega exhibitor looks to get out of the debt hole brought on by the pandemic.

item.title: AMC’s Lincoln Square Theatre Reopens After Flooding Monday Night During Torrential Downfall
item.description: All moviegoers were evacuated during the incident but most auditoriums — including one of the largest Imax screens in the world — suffered no damage and are back in business.

item.title: AMC’s Lincoln Square Theatre Reopens After Flooding Monday Night During Torrential Downfall
item.description: All moviegoers were evacuated during the incident but most auditoriums — including one of the largest Imax screens in the world — suffered no damage and are back in business.

item.title: Eminem Documentary ‘Stans’ Books Limited August Run in AMC Theatres

item.title: AMC Theatres Gets Stock Upgrade on Outlook of “More Consistent” Blockbuster Releases
item.description: Stock in the mega-exhibitor soared on Friday as a Wedbush analyst argued glaring uncertainties brought on by the pandemic and the Hollywood strikes is behind the debt-laden company.
